description: A firestorm caused by Allied bombers destroyed the historic centre of Dresden in February 1945.
title: Dresden: The World War Two bombing 75 years on
title_page: Dresden: The World War Two bombing 75 years on - BBC News
maintext: "The firestorm is incredible... Insane fear grips me and from then on I repeat one simple sentence to myself continuously: 'I don't want to burn to death'. I do not know how many people I fell over. I know only one thing: that I must not burn."
